resources.string: Below each Ishihara plate you will see buttons with option. Choose the one that best suits what you see after you have observed the image. Som may be ambiguous, so choose instinctively without thinking to much
Touch back again to close application
Color blind test app using Farnsworth Munsell formula with 40 Hue colors. Detail about this app and source code visit https://github.com/mustofa-id/color-blind-test
Are you sure want to check test result?\nIt\'s will finishing your test!
Total error score based on Farnsworth Munsell formula is %1$d
